amendment.description: An amendment numbered 78 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding to implement, finalize, or enforce the proposed rule entitled "Substantial Implementation, Duplication, and Resubmission of Shareholder Proposals Under Exchange Act Rule 14a-8".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
